actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To amend the Interstate Horseracing Act of 1978 to require the consent of certain horsemen's groups for interstate off-track wagers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Live Horseracing Protection Act of 2002 - Amends the Interstate Horseracing Act of 1978 to rename"horsemen's group" as "host horseman's group," distinguishing it from "off-track horsemen's group," a breed-specific group representing the majority of owners and trainers in an off-track State that corresponds to the breed of horse in the races subject to the interstate off-track wager on any racing day.Includes "off-track horsemen's group" among those whose consent is required for acceptance of interstate off-track wagers by an off-track betting system.

titles.title: To amend the Interstate Horseracing Act of 1978 to require the consent of certain horsemen's groups for interstate off-track wagers, and for other purposes.
